pageContext.description:
Charity, the personification of altruism, is depicted as a nude female figure, sitting on a stone block with four little children around her. One is being breast-fed. The group is shown in a landscape with rocks, trees and a village on a mountain in the background. This composition is probably a copy of a version in Nivå[DK_NMK_0017NMK] dated 1535.
[cda 2020]
